channel.title: lookup on Twilio API Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in lookup on Twilio API Explorer

item.title: Lookup v1
item.description: The Lookup API provides a way to retrieve additional information about a phone number. NUMBER Performs basic phone number validation and conversion from regional formatting to E.164 (free). console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/_includes\/lookup\/number.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.description: The Lookup v2 API provides a way to retrieve additional information about a phone number. NUMBER Performs basic phone number validation and conversion from regional formatting to E.164 (free). console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/_includes\/lookup-v2\/number.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .
